tasks.title: Design the user authentication flow
tasks.description: Outline the steps for user registration, login, token generation, and token validation. Include necessary security measures and edge case handling.

tasks.title: Implement user registration endpoint
tasks.description: Create a POST endpoint to handle user registration. Ensure the endpoint stores user data securely in the database or user management system. Implement proper validation and error handling.

tasks.title: Implement user login endpoint
tasks.description: Create a POST endpoint to handle user login requests. Ensure the endpoint generates a JWT token upon successful login and returns it to the client. Implement proper validation and error handling.

tasks.title: Implement token validation middleware
tasks.description: Develop a middleware function to validate JWT tokens for protected API endpoints. Ensure the middleware properly handles token expiration and revocation.

tasks.title: Integrate JWT token handling into the application
tasks.description: Ensure JWT tokens are properly generated and validated across the application. Integrate the token validation middleware into the application's routing structure.

tasks.title: Document the API endpoint
tasks.description: Create clear and concise documentation for the user authentication API endpoints, including request/response schemas and examples. Ensure the documentation is accessible and understandable.

tasks.title: Research REST API best practices
tasks.description: Study and understand the best practices for designing REST APIs, including security measures and validation techniques.

tasks.title: Understand existing authentication flow
tasks.description: Analyze the current user authentication flow to understand how it works and how the new endpoint should integrate with it.

tasks.title: Design REST API endpoint
tasks.description: Based on the research and understanding of the existing authentication flow, design the structure of the new REST API endpoint.

tasks.title: Implement REST API endpoint
tasks.description: Code the REST API endpoint according to the design, ensuring it integrates properly with the existing authentication flow and follows best practices.

tasks.title: Write tests for REST API endpoint
tasks.description: Create unit tests and integration tests to ensure the endpoint functions correctly and securely.

tasks.title: Document REST API endpoint
tasks.description: Create detailed documentation for the new REST API endpoint, including how to use it and any necessary setup instructions.
